I I oan (Enhancing Fiscal Management, Social Protection and Financial Inclusion DPL) to the I .tp blic of Paraguay. The undersigned member of the Committee constituted under Section 7 of Article 1 ol the Articles of Agreement of Internaticnal Bank for Reconstruction and Development (the Bank' eby submits this recommendation as part of the report pursuant to Section 4 (iii) of Article III of said A -les in respect of the proposal that the Eank grant to the Republic of Paraguay a loan in an amoun : one hundred million Dollars (US$100,001),000). The purpose of said loan is to support the Borrower's it i am of actions, objectives and policies disigned to assist the Borrower's efforts to strengthen sustai i lity, equity, transparency and efficiency in1 fiscal management, to improve the targeting of social progr iii and to increase the access to financial serices. I. The member of the Commit tee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to gran 'ill h a loan, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of the loan are to be applied. 2. The member of the Comm ttee is of the opinion that the program in support of wI i: Ii the proceeds of such loan are to be appli.-d comes within the purposes of the Bank as set forth in Arl I of said Articles of Agreement, and tfiat said program is designed to promote the developmen : the productive facilities and resources o 'the Republic of Paraguay and is in the interest of the Rep of Paraguay and of the members of the Bank as a whole. 3. Accordingly, the member oi the Committee finds that said program merits financial as .; s nce from the Bank, and hereby recommel ds said program for such assistance.
